content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Purchase the PUBG Starter Pack Bundle to receive 1,100 G-Coin, an additional 500 bonus G-Coin, and the Brown Hat Ranger Skin Set.

You can use G-Coin to purchase PUBG in-game cosmetics and more.

Includes the PUBG base game and the PUBG Test Server.

Download this BETA version of the client to test and provide feedback on future updates prior to their official release.
Please note:
Updates deployed to the PUBG Public Test Server are in development therefore may be unstable and do not represent the overall quality of the game.
Connection to the Public Test Server will only be available during specific periods.
You may experience extended wait times due to a limited pool of players.
Access to this PUBG Public Test Server is only available to those players who own the game.

1 Player, Network Features, 50GB Minimum Space Required, DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function, HD Video Output: 720p/1080p.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©2018 PUBG Corporation. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
